content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price for the apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The final price was not agreed upon. The highest I could offer was 700 Euro per month, but Yi-Nuo Wang was looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I am not satisfied with the outcome. However, this scale does not apply to my satisfaction with the negotiation outcome. I am a landlord seeking the highest possible price for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt
